data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 1,486,220 people in the state of Brandenburg who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Brandenburg, Germany
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Brandenburg, Germany find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 47 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Brandenburg, Germany to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Brandenburg, Germany need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab, Iraqi people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab, Iraqi people.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Brandenburg that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Brandenburg that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Brandenburg, Germany has a population of 2,511,500.

We estimate Brandenburg has 52,344 people who might know Jesus, 1,486,220 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 972,936 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 47 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Brandenburg, Germany humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?
